Title: Yankee White
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of a Navy Commander who died after having lunch with the President of the United States on board Air Force One and soon realize that a terrorist may be responsible. Series Premiere and also the first ever episode of NCIS as a stand-alone series. This episode marks the introduction of Secret Service Agent Caitlin Todd, FBI Agent Tobias Fornell, ME assistant Gerald Jackson, and the Mysterious Red-Head.

Title: Hung Out to Dry
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Marine who died during a night-training jump but the team discover that it may actually be a murder while Kate Todd adjusts to joining the NCIS team. This episode also marks a crossover with NCIS's parent series, JAG and marks the first appearance of Bud Roberts Jr..

Title: Seadog
Synopsis: The bodies of two drug dealers and a Navy Commander wash up on a beach, prompting NCIS to investigate where they soon realize that something else much worse than drug smuggling is going on.
Written by: John C. Kelley & Donald P. Bellisario

Title: The Immortals
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when the body of a young Seaman is discovered in the ocean and evidence is soon uncovered, suggesting that a biological attack may occur on the U.S.S. Foster, the Navy ship where the Seaman was stationed.

Title: The Curse
Synopsis: The mummified remains of a Navy Lieutenant are discovered in a sealed cargo pod, prompting NCIS to investigate. As the case progresses, Kate develops an emotional bond towards the victim's family and vows to ensure that the family get the Lieutenant's death benefits.
Written by: Don McGill & Jeff Vlaming & Donald P. Bellisario

Title: High Seas
Synopsis: A former member of the Major Case Response Team contacts Gibbs for help after two sailors stationed on board the USS Enterprise overdose meth despite the sailors claiming never to have taken the drug. This episode marks the debut appearance of NCIS Special Agent Stan Burley.

Title: Sub Rosa
Synopsis: When a badly disfigured body is discovered on the Norfolk Naval Base, NCIS investigate and work with a young Agent with the team soon discovering that the personnel of the U.S.S. Philadelphia may be in grave danger from a possible biological attack. This episode marks the debut appearance of NCIS Special Agent Timothy McGee.

Title: Minimum Security
Synopsis: A Petty Officer's death and the discovery that he had emeralds inside his stomach sends the NCIS team to Guantanamo Bay, Cuba as they seek to find out what happened while also attempting to stop a possible terrorist plot as well.
Written by: Philip DeGuere, Jr. & Donald P. Bellisario

Title: Marine Down
Synopsis: The team investigate when a supposedly dead Marine contacts his wife with the team soon discovering that a rogue CIA agent is responsible.

Title: Left for Dead
Synopsis: A woman digs herself out of her grave in Rock Creek Park, claiming to have knowledge of a bomb on board a Navy ship. As the team try to piece together what happened as well as the truth of Jane Doe's statements, Kate takes the woman under her wing, unaware that the woman has plans that could end terribly for everyone.

Title: Eye Spy
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when the body of a Navy Commander is found on the beach and as they investigate, the team uncover a plot of betrayal and murder.
Written by: George Schenck & Frank Cardea & Dana Coen

Title: My Other Left Foot
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when the single leg of a Marine is discovered in a dumpster is Clarksburg, West Virginia and they meet a doctor and her daughter who may know more than they're letting on.

Title: One Shot, One Kill
Synopsis: NCIS race to stop a sniper from targeting and killing various Marine recruiters in the Washington D.C. area.

Title: The Good Samaritan
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of a Commander in Grayson County and soon discover that they're not only dealing with one serial killer but two..

Title: Enigma
Synopsis: Gibbs investigates when he discovers that his former Commanding Officer is being hunted by the FBI and as the NCIS team investigate, they soon find themselves uncovering a possible conspiracy that is connected to the death of an FBI agent.

Title: Bête Noire
Synopsis: NCIS face a battle on their hands when an unknown terrorist invades the morgue and takes Ducky, Gerald and eventually Kate hostage.

Title: The Truth Is Out There
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of a Petty Officer and discover that one of the victim's friends may be the true killer.

Title: UnSEALeD
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when a former Navy SEAL convicted of killing his wife escapes from Leavenworth.

Title: Dead Man Talking
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when Agent Christopher Pacci is murdered while working on a cold case.

Title: Missing
Synopsis: NCIS are called to investigate the disappearance of a Marine and soon discover that an unlikely person has become a serial killer hellbent on revenge. This also marks the debut appearance of James Palmer.

Title: Split Decision
Synopsis: The NCIS investigate the death of a Marine and finds themselves caught in an operation that ATF are carrying out.

Title: A Weak Link
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of a Lieutenant and a Navy SEAL and find themselves under pressure to wrap up the investigation as soon as possible due to the fact that the dead Lieutenant's team are due to embark on a hostage rescue situation.

Title: Reveille
Synopsis: The mysterious terrorist from Bête Noire (episode) returns, leading to consequences for one member of the NCIS team.

Title: See No Evil
Synopsis: A Navy Captain's wife and blind daughter are kidnapped and held hostage, forcing NCIS to tackle the case of bringing both of the hostages home safely while also trying to find out who is responsible. This is the Season 2 premiere episode.

Title: The Good Wives Club
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when the mummified remains of a woman are found and soon discover that a serial killer may be responsible.

Title: Vanished
Synopsis: A Marine pilot goes missing, forcing NCIS to investigate and in the process, they discover a ten year old feud that is slowly destroying the small town of Smokey Corners, West Virginia.

Title: Lt. Jane Doe
Synopsis: The body of a Navy Lieutenant is discovered but things hit a snag when the NCIS team learn that she is not actually a Commander while the nature of the case causes Ducky begin to become distant from the team.
Written by: Steven Long Mitchell & Craig W. Van Sickle & Donald P. Bellisario & Gil Grant

Title: The Bone Yard
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of an undercover FBI agent and discover an agent of the FBI may be a mole for a Mafia crime boss.

Title: Terminal Leave
Synopsis: NCIS and the FBI must work together to find who is responsible for the attempted assassination of a Naval Commander and Iraqi veteran.

Title: Call of Silence
Synopsis: An elderly veteran who served in World War 2 arrives in to NCIS to confess that he killed his best friend. It now falls to the NCIS team to figure out the truth before JAG gets involved.

Title: Heart Break
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Naval Commander and they soon discover that the victim was not very well liked on the USS Kennedy while NCIS Special Agent Paula Cassidy returns to help the team with the case.

Title: Forced Entry
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when the wife of a Marine shoots an intruder in self-defense and as the case progresses, the team find themselves heading into the world of cyber sex along with the revelation that the intruder and his "sister" are not who they appear to be.

Title: Chained
Synopsis: Tony goes undercover as an escaped prisoner while the NCIS team soon find evidence suggesting that the man Tony is accompanying may be a serial killer.

Title: Black Water
Synopsis: The NCIS team must find a motive for the death of a Navy officer who disappeared two years previously.
Written by: John C. Kelley & Juan Carlos Coto

Title: Doppelgänger
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the alleged death of a Petty Officer and find themselves working with a team whose personalities are an exact match to their own but things take a turn when the Petty Officer is later found dead.

Title: The Meat Puzzle
Synopsis: Ducky's past comes back to haunt him, forcing the NCIS team to step to protect him as they also seek to determine who is responsible for the various meat puzzles. This also makes the debut appearance of Ducky's mother, Victoria Mallard.

Title: Witness
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the claim of a young woman who believes that she saw a sailor being strangled but things take a turn for the worse when the woman herself is murdered, leaving McGee devastated and the team on the hunt to capture her killer.

Title: Caught on Tape
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of a Marine and soon discover evidence suggesting that a previously dismissed suspect is the true killer while McGee is left infected with poison ivy.
Written by: Chris Crowe & Gil Grant & John C. Kelley

Title: Pop Life
Synopsis: The NCIS team tackle the case of a young Petty Officer who was found dead in a bed along with a bartender. It seems like a suicide until Ducky finds evidence suggesting otherwise and the team soon find that an unlikely suspect is responsible.

Title: An Eye for an Eye
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a package containing a pair of blue human eyeballs wind up in the locker of a civilian but when the Petty Officer commits suicide during the case, Tony and Kate head to Paraguay where they discover some horrifying secrets about the Officer's lecturer.

Title: Bikini Wax
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Petty Officer who drowned after having her head held down in a public toilet and soon discover that she was pregnant, leading them to a person who also happens to be the killer.

Title: Conspiracy Theory
Synopsis: NCIS investigate a Petty Officer who claims that she was attacked by someone in body armor. It appears to be a simple case but tragedy strikes when the Officer is found dead, having allegedly committed suicide. Ducky however soon discovers that the victim was actually murdered, sending the team on a search for her killer as they uncover a trail of romance, sex and deception at the local mental institution that the Officer was staying at before she died.

Title: Red Cell
Synopsis: A young college student discovers the body of a dead Marine and NCIS's investigation leads them to a Gunnery Sergeant who is not only the killer but also a rapist as well. This episode marks the debut appearance of Sarah McGee.

Title: Hometown Hero
Synopsis: When a Petty Officer dies while serving in Iraq, the NCIS team investigate when the remains of a young girl who went missing during their high school years are discovered in a storage unit. The team face further pressure to clear the case as quick as possible upon learning that the Officer is up for a Silver Star.

Title: SWAK
Synopsis: NCIS faces a huge crisis when they become victims of a biological attack and one member of the NCIS team is left fighting for their life after falling victim to the deadly disease while the rest of the NCIS team must determine who is responsible.

Title: Twilight
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the deaths of two sailors who were mysteriously gunned down while on leave and soon find themselves facing an enemy from their past with the battle ultimately having very dramatic and life-changing consequences for the team when one member of the NCIS team is brutally murdered...

Title: Kill Ari Part 1
Synopsis: As the NCIS team struggle to cope with Kate Todd's death at the hands of double agent Ari Haswari, Gibbs becomes fixated on avenging Kate by doing the only thing possible: killing Ari. This episode marked the debut appearance of Mossad Officer Ziva David and newly appointed NCIS Director Jennifer Shepard.

Title: Kill Ari Part 2
Synopsis: Gibbs races to save Ducky from Ari's clutches as the NCIS team continue to grieve over the murder of Agent Kate Todd but while Ziva David is a possible hindrance, she may also be the key to stopping Ari once for all.. This episode marked the final appearance of Caitlin Todd, Ari Haswari and Gerald Jackson although Kate and Ari would later return in the Season 9 episode, Life Before His Eyes (episode).

Title: Mind Games
Synopsis: Gibbs interrogates a serial killer who's on Death Row as McGee and DiNozzo go in search of the killer's latest victims but when Agent Paula Cassidy is kidnapped, the team suspect that a copycat killer is on the loose.
Written by: Jeffrey A. Kirkpatrick & John C. Kelley

Title: Silver War
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when the remains of a Marine are discovered in a Civil War casket while Ziva David returns, having been appointed as the Mossad Liaison Officer to NCIS.

Title: Switch
Synopsis: The team investigate when a Petty Officer is found shot dead and soon discover that the victim may have been leading a double life.

Title: The Voyeur's Web
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when the wife of a Marine Sergeant is murdered while performing a strip-tease for her online viewers, only for the team to discover that nothing is what it appears to be. This episode marks the debut appearance of Charles "Chip" Sterling.

Title: Honor Code
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigated the alleged kidnapping of a Navy Lieutenant Commander.

Title: Under Covers
Synopsis: When the two bodies of a husband and his wife who were also assassins are brought to NCIS, the team believe that a possible assassination may occur during the Marine Corps Birthday Ball. As such, Tony and Ziva go undercover as the dead assassins in hopes of finding out the truth but all is not what it seems...

Title: Frame-Up
Synopsis: The NCIS team are left stunned when evidence suggests that one of their own may be a killer. This episode also marks the final appearance of Charles "Chip" Sterling.

Title: Probie
Synopsis: NCIS race against the clock to protect McGee when it's revealed that the man he killed was a cop who was working undercover for the Metro Police Department.

Title: Model Behavior
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when a model participating in a reality TV show is found dead on a military base.

Title: Boxed In
Synopsis: When they come under fire while exploring a stockyard, Tony and Ziva are left trapped inside a shipping container. And with time of the essence, Gibbs and McGee race to save them before it's too late.

Title: Deception
Synopsis: On a Sunday, the NCIS team are summoned to the office to find a Navy Lieutenant Commander who has been abducted, only to discover that her personal life may hold the key as to why she was kidnapped in the first place.

Title: Light Sleeper
Synopsis: Two military wives are found dead and the NCIS team investigate the possibility that a North Korean sleeper cell may be responsible but all is not what it seems...

Title: Head Case
Synopsis: While arresting a group of Navy sailors who were operating an illegal chop shop, the NCIS team discover a severed head in the trunk of one of the stolen cars. The head is later identified as belonging to a Navy Captain and the team soon find themselves hunting down the people responsible.

Title: Family Secret
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when an ambulance carrying the remains of a Marine explodes.

Title: Ravenous
Synopsis: The remains of a Petty Officer are discovered in a park and further investigating reveals that there may be a serial killer who's using park accidents to cover up murders.

Title: Bait
Synopsis: The NCIS team tries to stop a teenager from blowing up a school, only to discover that there's more to the case than meets the eye.

Title: Iced
Synopsis: The body of a Marine is discovered in a frozen pond, prompting the NCIS team to investigate where they learn that a dangerous street gang may be responsible.

Title: Untouchable
Synopsis: A Navy Lieutenant commits suicide and it looks like a simple case but things change when Abby discovers that someone else was in the room with the Lieutenant when she died.

Title: Bloodbath
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate a routine crime scene and soon discover that one of their own may be in grave danger.

Title: Jeopardy
Synopsis: NCIS must not only investigate the death of a drug dealer who died while in Ziva's custody but also save Director Sheppard when she is kidnapped by the dead dealer's brother.

Title: Hiatus Part 1
Synopsis: An explosion on a foreign ship leaves Gibbs in a coma. As the NCIS team try to come to terms with the development, they find themselves chasing down a wanted terrorist while Tony assumes command of the team.

Title: Hiatus Part 2
Synopsis: After awakening from his coma, Gibbs struggles to remember who he is as the rest of the NCIS team continue searching for terrorist PinPin Pula.

Title: Shalom
Synopsis: Ziva goes on the run after witnessing an assassination. As NCIS attempt to find her, they must also solve the case and stop the FBI from arresting her.
Written by: John C. Kelley & Donald P. Bellisario

Title: Escaped
Synopsis: When his daughter's life is threatened, FBI agent Tobias Fornell turns to the NCIS team and a retired Gibbs for help.

Title: Singled Out
Synopsis: A Navy Lieutenant is kidnapped, forcing the NCIS team to investigate and they soon discover that it is much more than a simple kidnapping...

Title: Faking It
Synopsis: The team investigate the death of a Navy Petty Officer and discover that it may be connected to a case that Gibbs's mentor worked on during his time as an NIS agent.

Title: Dead and Unburied
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when the badly decayed remains of a Lance Corporal with the Marines is discovered in a house up for sale.

Title: Witch Hunt
Synopsis: As Washington D.C. celebrates Halloween, the NCIS team find themselves launching a rescue operation as they battle to save a young girl who has been kidnapped while Abby's Halloween costume leaves the team stunned.

Title: Sandblast
Synopsis: NCIS must work with the Army CID to uncover the truth behind an explosion at a golf course that has left a Marine Colonel dead while Tony must find a way to stop the victim's son from dropping out of college so that he can avenge his dead father. This episode marked the debut appearances of Lieutenant Colonel Hollis Mann, Tony's girlfriend Jeanne Benoit and terrorist Mamoun Sharif.

Title: Once a Hero
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when a Marine veteran falls to his death and the investigation uncovers evidence that an illegal human trafficking group might be operating in the D.C. area.

Title: Twisted Sister
Synopsis: McGee risks his career as an NCIS Special Agent to help his younger sister who believes that she may have killed someone while the NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy sailor who may have a connection to McGee's sister.

Title: Smoked
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when the body of an alleged serial killer is found on a Marine base but they soon discover that an unlikely suspect is the true killer. This episode also marks the debut appearance of CIA agent Trent Kort.

Title: Driven
Synopsis: A Navy Lieutenant dies after suffering from high levels of C02 poisoning which came from the car, "OTTO" she was testing. The NCIS team investigate and discover the alleged suicide is actually a murder..
Written by: Richard C. Arthur & Nell Scovell & John C. Kelley

Title: Suspicion
Synopsis: A intelligence officer for the Marines is found dead and NCIS head to the town to investigate the killing, only to discover that racism, prejudice and suspicion are alive and well among the town's population.

Title: Sharif Returns
Synopsis: A Marine Major's body is found in an underground sewer, prompting NCIS to investigate with the team and Army CID soon discovering that an old enemy is responsible.

Title: Blowback
Synopsis: NCIS must stop the sale of "ARES", a highly classified weapons system and an unlikely member of the NCIS team is sent undercover. This episode marks the first appearance of René Benoit AKA "La Grenouille" or the Frog.
Written by: Christopher Silber & David J. North & Shane Brennan

Title: Friends and Lovers
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when the body of a sailor is found in an abandoned restaurant, only to discover that the sailor is not who he appeared to be.

Title: Dead Man Walking
Synopsis: A Navy Lieutenant requests that NCIS investigate a murder- his.

Title: Skeletons
Synopsis: The NCIS team and Army CID investigate a explosion at a military cemetery mausoleum with both teams discovering the dismembered remains of many victims, leading them to suspect that a mass murderer is responsible.

Title: Iceman
Synopsis: A supposedly dead Marine regains consciousness on Ducky's table, prompting the NCIS team into launching an investigation while Gibbs soon discovers that the Marine is related to his mentor.

Title: Grace Period
Synopsis: Two NCIS agents are killed in a suicide bombing and the NCIS team must investigate to determine who is the true mastermind behind the explosion. This episode marks the final, credited appearance of NCIS Special Agent Paula Cassidy.

Title: Cover Story
Synopsis: A Petty Officer is murdered and it appears that the killing is connected to McGee's new, unpublished book.

Title: Brothers in Arms
Synopsis: An informant of Jenny's is killed, prompting the NCIS team to investigate and they discover that it may be connected to international arms dealer, "La Grenouille" aka "The Frog".

Title: In the Dark
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a blind photographer's photos show a dead Petty Officer in them.

Title: Trojan Horse
Synopsis: With Gibbs having been appointed as the temporary Director of NCIS due to Jenny being in Paris, attending an Interpol conference, the NCIS team tackle the case of a man who was found in a cab heading for NCIS Headquarters.

Title: Angel of Death
Synopsis: With NCIS agents having been scheduled for polygraphs that Homeland Security arranged at the request of the CIA, Gibbs and McGee dig deep into the history of both Jenny and the Frog and discover a possible connection between the two in the form of Jenny's dead father while Tony and Jeanne fight for their lives after being taken hostage by a pair of drug dealers.

Title: Bury Your Dead
Synopsis: With Tony's cover having been blown, Jenny is forced to tell the NCIS team the truth about Tony's undercover assignment and the team are left horrified when they see footage of Tony's car blowing up, prompting them to wonder if Tony is really dead or if he is still alive while Jenny herself confronts an old enemy.

Title: Family
Synopsis: The team investigate the death of a Petty Officer and soon find themselves not only trying to arrest the killer but to also arrest a kidnapped newborn baby.

Title: Ex-File
Synopsis: A Marine Captain is found dead and Gibbs finds his past and present relationships threatening to collide with one another.

Title: Identity Crisis
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when it's revealed that one of Ducky's cadavers was actually murdered. This episode marks the debut appearance of Dr. Jordan Hampton, a Medical Examiner and also a future love interest for Ducky.

Title: Leap of Faith
Synopsis: A suicidal Navy Lieutenant is shot and falls to his death during a high-profile stand-off. The NCIS team investigate and discover that someone close to the victim is responsible. This episode marks the debut appearance of NCIS Intel Analyst Nikki Jardine.

Title: Chimera
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a sailor on board a top-secret Naval research ship and soon discover that there's a secret lurking on board the ship, one that could cost the NCIS team their lives.

Title: Requiem
Synopsis: Gibbs aids a young woman who was his late daughter's best friend.

Title: Designated Target
Synopsis: The team investigate the killing of both an admiral and a cab driver, only for Gibbs to soon realize that it was the cab driver, not the admiral who was the true target and that an African-based assassination squad may be behind the killings.

Title: Lost and Found
Synopsis: The NCIS team discover that the father of a young boy may be a killer but all is not what it seems...

Title: Corporal Punishment
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when a Marine up for a Silver Star escapes from the hospital he's in. This episode also marks the debut appearance of Corporal Damon Werth.

Title: Tribes
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate of a Muslim Marine. This is also the last NCIS episode to have been completed before the Writers Strike of 2008.

Title: Stakeout
Synopsis: The NCIS team must find a missing stolen Navy radar.

Title: Dog Tags
Synopsis: The NCIS team raid the home of a Petty Officer and suspected drug dealer, only to find their suspect dead while McGee is left injured by being attacked by the victim's dog. As the team try to determine what happened while also attempting to dismantle a ongoing drug ring at the Pax River Naval Air Base, Abby puts her career and future at NCIS on the line as she seeks to protect the dog's innocence.
Written by: Dan E. Fesman & Alfonso H. Moreno

Title: Internal Affairs
Synopsis: The Frog's body is eventually discovered and the FBI led by Agent Tobias Fornell descend on NCIS to interview the members of the main NCIS team. This episode marks the debut appearance of Deputy Director/future NCIS Director Leon Vance.

Title: In the Zone
Synopsis: A Marine Captain is murdered in Iraq, prompting NCIS to investigate. As Gibbs, McGee, Ziva and Abby tackle the case from Washington D.C., Tony and Nikki Jardine head to Iraq to determine what really happened.

Title: Recoil
Synopsis: Ziva goes undercover to stop a serial killer but further investigation by NCIS soon reveals that there may be a copycat killer out there.
Written by: George Schenck & Frank Cardea & Dan E. Fesman

Title: About Face
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of a worker and soon discover that an assassin is targeting one of the NCIS team.
Written by: Alfonso H. Moreno & Reed Steiner & Jesse Stern

Title: Judgment Day Part 1
Synopsis: Jenny investigates the death of a former NIS agent and soon begins to suspect that there may be something bigger at stake. This episode marks the final appearance of Director Jenny Shepard although she would later return in the Season 9 episode, Life Before His Eyes (episode).
Written by: Steven D. Binder & David J. North

Title: Judgment Day Part 2
Synopsis: As the main NCIS team struggle to come to terms with Jenny Shepard's murder, they must also find out who is responsible while Tony and Ziva struggle to cope with the fact that they both failed to protect Jenny.
Written by: David J. North & Christopher J. Waild & Steven D. Binder

Title: Last Man Standing
Synopsis: A Petty Officer is found murdered and it appears that the death is connected to newly appointed NCIS Director Leon Vance's decision to break up Gibbs's original NCIS team and create a new one in its place while Gibbs and Vance start to suspect the possibility that one member of Gibbs's new team may be a mole but all is not what it seems.

Title: Agent Afloat
Synopsis: A Navy Lieutenant apparently falls overboard, prompting NCIS to investigate but when McGee and Ziva arrive at the Lieutenant's home, they discover that his wife has been murdered and that it may be connected to a possible anthrax attack on the USS Seahawk.
Written by: Dan E. Fesman & David J. North

Title: Capitol Offense
Synopsis: The body of a Lieutenant Commander is pulled from a river and NCIS investigate. Gibbs soon finds his loyalties being tested when an old friend who is now a Senator contacts Gibbs for help while Abby attempts to find out who stole the cupcake that she received from Ziva.

Title: Heartland
Synopsis: Two Marines are attacked in an alleyway outside a bar. one Marine dies while the other survives. The investigation leads Gibbs, McGee and Ziva and later Tony and Abby to Gibbs's hometown: Stillwater, Pennsylvania where they meet Gibbs's estranged father.

Title: Nine Lives
Synopsis: A Marine is found dead in a garage and the NCIS team's investigation leads them to a possible suspect: the victim's former C.O, only for NCIS to discover that the suspect is under FBI protection...
Written by: Linda Burstyn & Dan E. Fesman & David J. North

Title: Murder 2.0
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when the body of a Navy Petty Officer and finds themselves pursing a psychopathic serial killer.

Title: Collateral Damage
Synopsis: A bank at Quantico is robbed, resulting in the death of a security guard. The NCIS team investigate the crime with a rookie agent assisting them. This episode also marks the final albeit uncredited appearance of deceased NCIS Special Agent Paula Cassidy.

Title: Cloak
Synopsis: The NCIS team participate in a dangerous war game and a shocking secret about one NCIS Special Agent is finally revealed.

Title: Dagger
Synopsis: With Michelle Lee having been exposed as the NCIS mole, the NCIS team must work with the disgraced Agent to help her save her kidnapped sister before it's too late while Tony struggles to deal with Lee's betrayal. This episode marked the final appearance of NCIS Special Agent Michelle Lee.

Title: Road Kill
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Petty Officer and as such, are led into the underground world of street fighting.

Title: Silent Night
Synopsis: Two days before Christmas, the NCIS team investigate a home invasion robbery and are left stunned when the suspect is thought have died nineteen years previously..

Title: Caged
Synopsis: A simple interview with a suspect turns serious when a security guard stumbles into the visiting center of the local Maryland Prison McGee is visiting, triggering a riot. The prisoners respond by taking a few of the guards as well as McGee himself hostage with one demand: find and bring the murderer responsible to justice. With time of the essence, Gibbs, Tony, Ziva, Abby and Ducky must work to solve the case and save McGee before it's too late.

Title: Broken Bird
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the murder of a sailor and the case soon becomes personal when Ducky is attacked and stabbed in the hand by a woman who then flees the scene. With two cases to tackle, the team must dig into Ducky's past and determine his time in Afghanistan serves as a possible motive for the attack.

Title: Love and War
Synopsis: A Navy captain goes missing and is soon found dead with the NCIS team soon suspecting that his death may be espionage-related.
Written by: Steven D. Binder & David J. North

Title: Deliverance
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Marine's body is found and when his service number is found at the scene, Gibbs contacts his mentor for help.

Title: Bounce
Synopsis: A man is found dead and DiNozzo discovers that the killing may be connected to a case that he investigated as the NCIS team leader three years ago....
Written by: David J. North & Steven D. Binder

Title: South by Southwest
Synopsis: An NCIS Special Agent is murdered and the NCIS team discover that the killing may be connected to a woman residing in Arizona, sending Gibbs and Tony to Arizona where with the help of a local Sheriff, they must track down the woman before it's too late.

Title: Knockout
Synopsis: A friend of Vance's is murdered, prompting Vance to travel to Chicago with McGee and Ziva. This has Gibbs digging into Vance's past where he soon discovers that nothing is what it appears to be...

Title: Hide and Seek
Synopsis: The team investigate when a gun is found in the possession of a twelve year old boy.

Title: Dead Reckoning
Synopsis: Gibbs and Trent Kort work albeit grudgingly together to help stop a man who has suspected links to an international crime boss but the two men and the NCIS team soon discover that nothing is what it seems..
Written by: Reed Steiner & Christopher J. Waild & David J. North

Title: Toxic
Synopsis: Abby joins a government project and the NCIS team soon discover that a government scientist previously associated with the project.

Title: Legend Part 1
Synopsis: When a Marine is found murdered in downtown D.C., the case has Gibbs and McGee traveling to Los Angeles where they work with their counterparts in the NCIS Office of Special Projects with both teams soon discovering that a terrorist cell may be responsible for the death. This episode along with "Legend Part 2" both serve as a backdoor pilot episode for the NCIS spin-off series, NCIS: Los Angeles.

Title: Legend Part 2
Synopsis: In Los Angeles, the OSP team along with Gibbs and McGee face a race against the clock to stop foreign agent, Mossad Officer Michael Rivkin from killing the members of the sleeper terrorist cell while back in D.C, Tony continue his own investigating into Ziva's private life, fearful that she may not be loyal to NCIS.

Title: Semper Fidelis
Synopsis: An agent with ICE is killed while on security detail at the house of SECNAV Phillip Davenport, prompting NCIS and the FBI to investigate. Meanwhile, Tony meets Ziva's boyfriend, Michael Rivkin for the first time with the two men later colliding in a fight that threatens to tear the main NCIS team apart.

Title: Aliyah
Synopsis: With Rivkin now dead, the NCIS team must pick up the pieces and investigate what happened while Ziva tries to come to terms with the aftermath. As McGee and Abby work the case in D.C., Gibbs, DiNozzo, Ziva and Vance arrive in Tel Aviv to hold a series of meetings with Ziva's father, Eli David who is demanding answers. However, when Gibbs later gets some unpleasant news, he makes a decision that may ultimately change the NCIS team forever...

Title: Truth or Consequences
Synopsis: DiNozzo is captured by a terrorist who is seeking revenge against both NCIS and Mossad.

Title: Reunion
Synopsis: Three men are found dead and Gibbs, Tony and McGee investigate, searching for a motive. Meanwhile, Ziva returns and her future at NCIS now lies in the hands of both Gibbs and Vance.

Title: The Inside Man
Synopsis: As NCIS investigate the death of a political blogger, they face heat from a Metro Police Department while Ziva, having resigned from Mossad for good begins the progress to become an NCIS Special Agent.

Title: Good Cop, Bad Cop
Synopsis: Ziva's plans to become an NCIS Special Agent hit a snag when her application is rejected with Vance informing that she's under investigation due to the discovery of a Marine's badly decayed remains. As Gibbs, Tony, McGee, Abby and Ducky race to prove Ziva's innocence, the case is complicated further by the arrival a Mossad officer who also happens to be Ziva's commanding officer.

Title: Code of Conduct
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Marine and soon discover that the death is not a suicide but actually a murder while Ziva adjusts to her new role as an NCIS Special Agent.

Title: Outlaws and In-Laws
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when the bodies of two dead men on board a boat named the "Kelly" wind up in a harbor. The case sends Gibbs and Vance to Mexico with Gibbs fearing the worse for his mentor and his mentor's family.

Title: Endgame
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a doctor is found murdered with Vance soon revealing a personal connection to the killer. This is the second and final part of a crossover episode between NCIS: Los Angeles and NCIS with "Endgame" being credited as an official NCIS episode and also airing as part of NCIS Season 7.

Title: Power Down
Synopsis: The NCIS team face their most challenging case to date when without any power, they must resort to old-school methods to solve the death of a Navy officer.
Written by: Steven D. Binder & David J. North

Title: Child's Play
Synopsis: As they prepare to celebrate Thanksgiving, the NCIS team must tackle the case of a Marine who was found dead in a corn field and also protect a young girl from the killer.

Title: Faith
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Marine and discover that the killing may related to the fact that the victim recently converted to Muslim while Gibbs's father returns.

Title: Ignition
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the circumstances surrounding the death of a Navy pilot, Gibbs meets a lawyer who has a strong grudge against him. This episode marked the debut appearance of Margaret Allison Hart.

Title: Flesh and Blood
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate an assassination attempt against a Saudi prince while Tony's father arrives to talk to his son. This episode also marked the debut appearance of Anthony D. DiNozzo, Sr.

Title: Jet Lag
Synopsis: As Tony and Ziva head to Paris to bring a witness back to the United States, they discover that the witness is being targeted by a contract killer while back in the United States, Gibbs and McGee investigate the killing of a Marine who's more than he appears to be. This episode marked the debut appearance of D.C. madam Holly Snow.

Title: Masquerade
Synopsis: NCIS face a battle on their hands as they fight to stop a terrorist group who are planning on releasing dirty bombs on Washington D.C.

Title: Jack-Knife
Synopsis: The NCIS team and FBI agent Tobias Fornell battle to stop and expose an illegal trucking operation while Ziva is later reunited with someone from the team's past.

Title: Mother's Day
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy captain while Gibbs is reunited with his former mother in law, forcing Gibbs to confront his painful past head on. This episode also marked the debut appearance of Detective Philip McCadden.

Title: Double Identity
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the shooting of a civilian and the team are left stunned when McGee uncovers evidence that the man was a Marine who went missing in Afghanistan six years ago while Ducky's strange behavior has Abby and Ziva concerned.

Title: Jurisdiction
Synopsis: NCIS and the CGIS Coast Guard Investigative Service Joint must together to solve the case of a dead Navy driver but things are not what they seem. This episode marked the debut appearance of CGIS agent Abigail Borin.

Title: Guilty Pleasure
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy Lieutenant and discover that a series of killings may be connected to a call-girl. This episode also marked the final appearances of both Madam Holly Snow and Metro Police Department Detective Philip McCadden.

Title: Moonlighting
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Petty Officer and soon uncover a conspiracy with a federal judge at the heart of it.

Title: Obsession
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the death of a Lieutenant, DiNozzo develops a fascination with the victim's sister who is also a reporter.

Title: Borderland
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the death of a Marine Corporal, they find evidence suggesting that the Corporal may have been a serial killer while Abby and McGee travel to Mexico with Abby soon discovering that the case she's been given concerns a well-known member of the NCIS team.

Title: Patriot Down
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the badly charred remains of a body and are left stunned when they discover that the body is that of a NCIS Special Agent while Abby takes matters into her own hands after Gibbs refuses to talk about what happened in Mexico.

Title: Rule Fifty-One
Synopsis: Now a prisoner of the head of the Reynosa Cartel, Gibbs finds that his past has come back to haunt him while Ziva is finally sworn as a citizen of the United States, having successfully passed her citizenship tests.

Title: Spider and the Fly
Synopsis: The NCIS team go head to head against Paloma Reynosa and her brother, Alejandro Rivera in one final battle that could ultimately determine the fate of everyone Gibbs loves while Mike Franks returns to help Gibbs.

Title: Worst Nightmare
Synopsis: A gas attack results in the disappearance of a young girl. As NCIS fight to find and save the girl, they face resistance from the girl's grandfather.

Title: Short Fuse
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the shooting of an alleged home invader, only to discover that the supposed invader was actually a hitman.

Title: Royals and Loyals
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when an American sailor is found dead in a bathtub, leading them to uncover a web of espionage concerning a corrupt CIA agent and a Major with the British Navy who's more than he appears to be.

Title: Dead Air
Synopsis: Three men at a radio station are brutally gunned down and as the NCIS team investigate, they find evidence suggesting that a home-grown terrorist group may be behind the killings.

Title: Cracked
Synopsis: A Navy researcher dies after being struck by a bus and as the NCIS team investigate her death, Abby develops a fixation on solving the codes on the victim's body.

Title: Broken Arrow
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a high-level executive and soon find evidence that a nuclear weapon that went missing 54 years ago may now in the hands of a lone group while Tony DiNozzo Senior returns and Gibbs enlists his help to solve the case much to Tony DiNozzo Junior's dismay.

Title: Enemies Foreign
Synopsis: The NCIS team are given the assignment of guarding Eli David, the Director of Mossad and Ziva's estranged father who is being targeted by a rogue Palestinian terrorist group.

Title: Enemies Domestic
Synopsis: In the aftermath of the attack that has left a Mossad officer dead and Vance badly injured, the NCIS team investigate the case while Gibbs digs into Vance's past and discover the truth behind Vance's friendship with Eli David.

Title: False Witness
Synopsis: When a Petty Officer who's also the sole witness in an upcoming murder case goes missing, a Deputy D.A. enlists the NCIS team's help to find him while McGee and Ziva try to find out why Tony has been acting so unusual.

Title: Ships in the Night
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Marine is shot dead while on a dinner boat with his family and are assisted by CGIS agent Abigail Borin.

Title: Recruited
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Naval recruiter is killed on the campus of a high school while Ducky's predecessor pays the NCIS office a visit.

Title: Freedom
Synopsis: A Marine is found dead in his backyard and the NCIS team must investigate but they soon discover that the Marine's wife has a dark secret.

Title: A Man Walks into a Bar
Synopsis: The NCIS team undergo psychological evaluations and meet someone who has a connection to a former member of the team.

Title: Defiance
Synopsis: The NCIS team are assigned to protect the daughter of the Belgravian Defense Minister.

Title: Kill Screen
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Marine is murdered and discovered that it could be connected to a potential attack on the Pentagon's computers.

Title: One Last Score
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a former investigative assistant which may be connected to a high-profile fraud case while a new agent joins the Washington D.C. branch.

Title: Out of the Frying Pan
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a retired Marine Colonel while Gibbs begins questioning Vance's motives for giving them the case.
Written by: Reed Steiner & Christopher J. Waild & Leon Carroll, Jr.

Title: Tell-All
Synopsis: The NCIS team along with FBI agent Tobias Fornell search for a manscript that may be connected to the death of a Naval officer and an FBI agent.

Title: Two-Faced
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Naval seaman and discover that the murder could be connected to a series of killings that have occurred at Naval ports all over the world.

Title: Dead Reflection
Synopsis: As EJ Barrett and her team tackle the Port-to-Port case, Gibbs and his team handle their latest case: the murder of a Naval officer who worked at the Pentagon. It looks like a simple case but all is not what it seems.

Title: Baltimore
Synopsis: When his former partner is found murdered, DiNozzo investigates and finds himself remembering a series of events that led him from the Baltimore Police Department and later inspired him to join NCIS.

Title: Swan Song
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate upon discovering that the Port-to-Port killer has managed to infiltrate the Navy Yard but they're all left shocked and devastated when a friend of the team becomes the serial killer's latest victim.

Title: Pyramid
Synopsis: A series of events lead NCIS into a final showdown with the psychopathic yet elusive Port-to-Port serial killer and the NCIS team find themselves on the hunt after two members of the agency are kidnapped.

Title: Nature of the Beast
Synopsis: When Tony is left injured after working on an assignment with the new Secretary of the Navy and suffering from amnesia, it falls to the NCIS team to determine what happened.

Title: Restless
Synopsis: A homecoming party ends in tragedy when a Marine is stabbed to death, prompting the NCIS team to investigate.

Title: The Penelope Papers
Synopsis: The team investigate the death of a Naval officer and discover that his murder may be connected to a top-secret project that was created thirty years ago while the team meet McGee's grandmother.

Title: Enemy on the Hill
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when they learn that a Navy Commander is being targeted by a mysterious assassin while Abby discovers some startling secrets about her own family history.

Title: Safe Harbor
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Coast Guard Officer is shot dead and with the help of CGIS agent Abigail Borin, uncover a possible terrorist plot that could destroy the Norfolk Naval Base.

Title: Thirst
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Naval Lieutenant is found dead and they soon discover evidence that strongly suggests that they're dealing with a serial killer.

Title: Devil's Triangle
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the abduction of the current husband of Gibbs and Fornell's ex-wife, Diane Sterling.

Title: Engaged Part 1
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when a C-130 carrying the remains of Marines who were killed fighting in Afghanistan crashes into a field and evidence soon comes to light, suggesting that a supposedly dead Marine may actually be alive.

Title: Engaged Part 2
Synopsis: Gibbs and Ziva head to Afghanistan to rescue a kidnapped Marine from the clutches of a member of a terrorist organization and they and the rest of the NCIS team must stop a terrorist attack from happening.

Title: Sins of the Father
Synopsis: DiNozzo is sidelined when his father becomes a suspect in the death of a man. This episode also marked the debut appearance of Ned Dorneget.

Title: Newborn King
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the murder of a Navy captain and soon discover that it's his pregnant, female companion who is the true target. Worse still, there are Russian mercenaries after her, forcing Gibbs and Ziva into an intense gunfight when they become stranded at a gas station while DiNozzo and McGee race to save them before it's too late.

Title: Housekeeping
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy Commander and in the process, Tony is reunited with someone from his past as an old enemy of the NCIS team returns. This episode also marked the final appearance of Erica Jane Barrett and Sean Latham.

Title: A Desperate Man
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy Commander but the investigation is hampered by the victim's grieving husband who also happens to be a Metro Police Department Detective while Ziva gets a shock when her boyfriend proposes to her. This episode also marked the final appearance of Ray Cruz, CIA agent and Ziva's boyfriend.

Title: Life Before His Eyes
Synopsis: While in a stand-off at a diner, Gibbs finds himself being transported to a mysterious room in the diner where he relives the decisions that have shaped his life and wonders what could have been if certain scenarios hadn't played out while flashbacks show the team handling a case that later turns into international espionage concerning the Chinese.

Title: Secrets
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy officer and soon uncover a society of real-life superheroes while DiNozzo gets a shock when his ex-fiancee returns.

Title: Psych Out
Synopsis: A Naval reservist is found dead and the NCIS team have to investigate to determine if it was a suicide or a murder. This episode also marked the debut appearance of Dr. Samantha Ryan.

Title: Need to Know
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of a Chief Petty Officer but find themselves suffering setbacks in the form of red tape and agents from the Defense Intelligence Agency.

Title: The Tell
Synopsis: NCIS must work with Dr. Samantha Ryan to find a possible mole in the wake of a security breach being exposed.

Title: The Good Son
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Petty Officer is found dead, having been stabbed while the team meet Vance's brother-in-law who soon becomes a potential suspect.

Title: The Missionary Position
Synopsis: Tony and Ziva along with a member of the Chaplain Corps travel to Colombia to save a kidnapped fellow Chaplain while Gibbs and McGee handle the rest of the case from Washington D.C.

Title: Rekindled
Synopsis: The team join forces with members of the Baltimore Fire Department when it's revealed that a fire at a warehouse where Navy documents are stored could have potential national security issues while Tony is reunited with the boy from Baltimore.

Title: Playing with Fire
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the explosion that happened on the USS Brewer and soon find themselves racing against time to stop another attack from occurring on the Benjamin Franklin.

Title: Up in Smoke
Synopsis: NCIS investigate after a bug is discovered in the tooth of agent Ned Dorneget.

Title: Till Death Do Us Part
Synopsis: The NCIS team search for Vance and soon, the entire Navy Yard is threatened by a potential attack, one that could cost Gibbs and his team their lives. This episode marked the final appearance of both Jonathan Cole and Samantha Ryan and was also the final episode to have Brian Dietzen (Jimmy Palmer) credited as "Also Starring".

Title: Extreme Prejudice
Synopsis: As they recover from the efforts of Harper Dearing's attack on the Navy Yard, the NCIS team race to stop Dearing once and for all with the FBI assisting them.

Title: Recovery
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when the body of NCIS's facilities manager is discovered while the team undergo psychological evaluations to determine how the Navy bombing has affected them.

Title: Phoenix
Synopsis: Ducky investigates the case of a Navy Commander whom he personally autopsied twelve years ago and as he takes charge of the case, the NCIS team find evidence suggesting that the supposed accidental death may have been murder while the team investigate when a Marine is dead and as the investigation unfolds, it appears that the two deaths are apparently connected.

Title: The Namesake
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the murder of a Petty Officer while Gibbs meets his namesake who is also a friend of his father's.

Title: Lost at Sea
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when three members of a helicopter crew wash up on a beach, the crew having spent four days adrift at sea. But what should be a simple case becomes a murder investigate when the pilot is found dead. As this happens, Ziva challenges DiNozzo and McGee to a dare.

Title: Shell Shock Part 1
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy Lieutenant and discover that something much sinister is in play.

Title: Shell Shock Part 2
Synopsis: The NCIS team race to stop a possible and potentially devastating terrorist attack from happening while Ziva's plans for the opera have Tony interested while Abby prepares for the NCIS Thanksgiving family dinner.

Title: Gone
Synopsis: The NCIS team must find and save a kidnapped girl while trying to solve a murder case that's connected to the kidnapping while Tony is jealous after learning that Ziva is making plans with a mysterious man.

Title: Devil's Trifecta
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate an assassination attempt on the life of FBI agent Tobias Fornell with Gibbs and Fornell getting a shock when they meet their ex-wife who they discover is involved in a separate investigation altogether.

Title: You Better Watch Out
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when the husband of a Navy Lieutenant is found while Tony DiNozzo Sr arrives in Washington D.C. to spend Christmas with his son.

Title: Shabbat Shalom
Synopsis: A father and son out on a fishing trip discover the body of a Petty Officer, only for things to take a turn when it's discovered that the victim is actually a journalist while Ziva deals with the return of her estranged father.

Title: Shiva
Synopsis: In the aftermath of the shooting that has left both Eli David and Jackie Vance dead, NCIS searches for a potential motive behind the attack while Ziva is hellbent on revenge by any means necessary.
Written by: Scott Williams & Christopher J. Waild & Gary Glasberg

Title: Hit and Run
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the deaths of a Marine Lance Corporal and his civilian girlfriend with the case leading Abby to recall some painful memories associated with the first ever case she worked on when she was a young girl living in New Orleans.

Title: Canary
Synopsis: NCIS must use every trick in the book to get a renowned hacker to give them the location of the most wanted cyber terrorist in the world in the aftermath of an attack on MTAC that cost an undercover NCIS Special Agent his life.

Title: Hereafter
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the death of a Marine at Quantico, Vance uncovers new information about his wife that causes him to question everything.

Title: Detour
Synopsis: The NCIS team face a race against the clock when Ducky and Jimmy are kidnapped on the way back from a crime scene.

Title: Prime Suspect
Synopsis: As a favor for a friend, Gibbs investigates the friend's son while wondering if the son could be a possible serial killer.

Title: Seek
Synopsis: The team investigate when a Marine is shot dead by a sniper in Afghanistan, forcing Gibbs and McGee to head to Afghanistan to uncover the truth.

Title: Squall
Synopsis: In the aftermath of a huge storm, NCIS border the U.S.S. Borealis to determine who is responsible for the death of the ship's doctor while McGee meets his estranged father.

Title: Chasing Ghosts
Synopsis: A Navy reservist asks the NCIS team for help in finding her husband who has been kidnapped while Tony becomes concerned for Ziva and believes that she is planning something in the hope of avenging her dead father.

Title: Berlin
Synopsis: As Gibbs, McGee and Abby investigate the death of a Mossad officer, Tony and Ziva head for Berlin, Germany to pursue Ilan Bodnar, the man responsible for Eli David and Jackie Vance's murders. This episode also marked the debut appearance of Orli Elbaz.

Title: Revenge
Synopsis: NCIS searches for Ilan Bodnar while Tony and Ziva struggle to cope in the aftermath of their car accident. This episode also marked the final appearance of Ilan Bodnar.

Title: Double Blind
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the claims of a Petty Officer who believe he was being followed, they find themselves under investigation for their role in the Ilan Bodnar incident.
Written by: Christopher J. Waild & Steven D. Binder

Title: Damned If You Do
Synopsis: Following Gibbs's arrest, the NCIS team must rally together to protect him and stop him from taking the fall. As this happens, they investigate the murder of a Navy SEAL.

Title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
Synopsis: The NCIS team struggle to come to terms with the aftermath of the events of the last episode and face a huge challenge when an explosion at an event in D.C. leaves the SECNAV dead and an associate of NCIS badly injured while, DiNozzo and McGee attempt to cope with the fact that they're both civilians and things get worse when it's revealed that the Brotherhood of Doubt are not only targeting NCIS but Ziva as well.

Title: Past, Present, and Future
Synopsis: As Tony heads to Israel to search for Ziva, back in D.C., Gibbs and McGee continue searching for Benham Parsa. This episode also marked the final appearance of Ziva David.
Written by: Scott Williams & Gina Lucita Monreal & Gary Glasberg

Title: Under the Radar
Synopsis: The team investigate an explosion at a Lieutenant's apartment, only to discover that the Lieutenant who washed out of aviator training is out for revenge against his former Naval classmates while McGee struggles to come to terms with the fallout that could occur after accidentally losing his badge and credentials and the team try to adjust to life without Ziva.

Title: Anonymous was a Woman
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of a Marine Sergeant, only for McGee to discover that the supposed Sergeant is actually an Afghani immigrant. This sends both McGee and Gibbs to Afghanistan to investigate further with Gibbs recalling how his mentor supported the Afghan's women shelter.

Title: Once a Crook
Synopsis: Still struggling with Ziva's departure, DiNozzo sees a suspect from a fifteen-old case at the scene of a murdered Naval officer, prompting DiNozzo to recall his time as a Baltimore Police Department officer.

Title: Oil and Water
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the bombing on board an oil rig while a mysterious prankster is targeting members of the team.

Title: Better Angels
Synopsis: As Gibbs leaves to help his father, Tony and McGee argue over who gets point as the NCIS team attempt to solve the murder of a Marine Sergeant.

Title: Alibi
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate a hit and run that resulted in the death of a Petty Officer but complications arise when the suspect's lawyer informs the team tells Gibbs that she's confident her client's alibi is solid while McGee grows suspicious of Tony's strange behavior.

Title: Gut Check
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when they discover that Secretary of the Navy Sarah Porter has been bugged. They then call on the help of a young NSA agent who two years ago predicted that a security breach would occur.

Title: Devil's Triad
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Marine Corporal while Ellie Bishop adjusts to joining the NCIS team.

Title: Homesick
Synopsis: NCIS race to stop a mysterious illness plaguing children from various military families while Vance is left stunned when his estranged father-in-law pays a visit.

Title: Kill Chain
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of a Petty Officer and discover that the elusive terrorist Benham Persa has captured a drone which he intends to use as a means of striking back against the United States. This episode also marked the debut appearance of Benham Parsa and the return of Retired Lieutenant Colonel Hollis Mann after a seven year absence.

Title: Double Back
Synopsis: NCIS battle to find Parsa in the aftermath of the drone attack on the black-tie gala function while McGee struggles to cope with the aftermath and also the news that his girlfriend has been left permanently paralyzed.

Title: Monsters and Men
Synopsis: NCIS continue their relentless quest to bring Parsa to justice while Bishop reveals her past connection to the wanted terrorist.

Title: Bulletproof
Synopsis: NCIS discover body armor in the back of a downed bakery truck but the investigation grows intense when Abby's tests reveal that the vests are actually faulty.

Title: Dressed to Kill
Synopsis: As Tony is grounded for an IG investigation after shooting a man who was allegedly impersonating a Navy officer, the rest of the NCIS team investigate and how it's all connected to a United States Senator while DiNozzo Senior arrives back in town with a secret that he has to reveal to his son.

Title: Rock and a Hard Place
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate a explosion and need to determine if the target was a washed up rock star who was big in the 1980s while Palmer prepares for fatherhood.

Title: Crescent City
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the murder of a Congressman who was also a highly decorated NIS agent and join forces with their NCIS New: Orleans counterparts with both teams suspecting that it could be connected to the Privileged Killer case.

Title: Crescent City Part 2
Synopsis: As Gibbs and Bishop explore New Orleans to search for the copycat killer of the Privileged Killer with Gibbs's friend, NCIS Special Agent Dwayne Cassius Pride and Pride's own team assisting them, back in D.C, DiNozzo and McGee continue exploring other aspects connected to the case with help from FBI Agent Tobias Fornell while DiNozzo receives a surprise gift from Bishop.

Title: Page Not Found
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate a potentially conversational case while McGee wonders if he should ask Delilah to move in with him or not.

Title: Alleged
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy officer and discover that it may be connected to an attack on a female Naval officer.

Title: Shooter
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the disappearance of a Marine photographer and soon discover that his murder may be connected to an illegal organ harvesting trade while Abby tries to help a young homeless woman reconnect with her family.

Title: The Admiral's Daughter
Synopsis: While in France to escort the daughter of an Admiral to America, DiNozzo finds himself on the run after being framed for murder.

Title: Honor Thy Father
Synopsis: As Gibbs struggles to cope with his father's death, the rest of the NCIS team find themselves investigating a breakout on board a Navy ship and as such, are reunited with an enemy from their past.

Title: Twenty Klicks
Synopsis: Gibbs and McGee travel to Russia to escort an NCIS computer engineer back to America but things take a turn when their helicopter is downed by a missile, forcing Gibbs and McGee into a fight for their lives against a Russian mercenary group who want them dead. This episode also marked the debut appearance of recurring character, terrorist Sergei Mishnev.

Title: Kill The Messenger
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy Lieutenant and must determine if his death was a part of a recent stream of muggings in the area or a targeted hit to keep intel secret.

Title: So It Goes
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate a death and Ducky discovers a connection to his childhood, prompting Ducky and Bishop to travel to London as they seek to determine what happened while back in D.C., the rest of the team tackle the case.

Title: Choke Hold
Synopsis: SECNAV assigns the NCIS team to a joint terrorist task force after a research scientist working for the Navy dies from wounds sustained from being garroted with Gibbs telling DiNozzo to run interference with the leader of the task force, FBI Agent Leia Pendergast.

Title: The San Dominick
Synopsis: Gibbs investigates when the body of a man is found overboard with the NCIS team and CGIS agent Abigail Borin discovering that the dead man was a member of a cargo ship 60 miles away. Upon boarding the ship to get answers as to what happened, Gibbs finds himself becoming a hostage as the ship has been taken over by pirates but all is not what it seems...

Title: Parental Guidance Suggested
Synopsis: A woman whose Navy SEAL husband's name is on a jihadist hit list has been murdered, and the team must figure out if her death was the result of a terrorist attack or something much more sinister. One of Tony's old friends, ATF Special Agent Zoe Keates, is introduced.

Title: The Searchers
Synopsis: NCIS investigate the death of a retired Master Sergeant and discover a fraudulent charity that preys on those searching for missing military personnel while Bishop agonizes over her probationary exam results.

Title: Semper Fortis
Synopsis: Gibbs looks for a way to clear a Navy Hospital Corpsman of charges after she has illegally helped the victims of a hit and run.
Written by: Matthew R. Jarrett & Scott J. Jarrett

Title: Grounded
Synopsis: While weather worsens outdoors, DiNozzo, Bishop, and her husband, Jake, are stuck at Dulles airport working on a case involving a terrorist threat.

Title: House Rules
Synopsis: The NCIS team consult with three cyber-terrorists they imprisoned after a citywide Internet shutdown the week before Christmas. Meanwhile, McGee reflects on the case and Gibbs' infamous rules as he writes a heartfelt letter to his father.

Title: Check
Synopsis: As the team investigate some crime scenes that appear to be copycat of previous crime scenes, Gibbs finds himself being cornered when two of his ex-wives return, only for tragedy to strike when someone close to Gibbs is brutally murdered.

Title: The Enemy Within
Synopsis: The NCIS team searches for a home-grown terrorist after a rescue mission in Syria reveals an American was involved in the capture of a social worker. Meanwhile, McGee and Bishop question DiNozzo’s unusual behavior.

Title: We Build, We Fight
Synopsis: Gibbs and the team investigate when a Navy lieutenant who is set to be the first openly gay servicemember to receive the Medal of Honor is murdered. Also, as his wife’s due date approaches, Palmer prepares for fatherhood with a NCIS baby shower.

Title: Cadence
Synopsis: DiNozzo returns to the military academy he attended as a teen after a murdered Marine, who was an alumnus of the school, is found clutching the photo of a current student. Meanwhile, Bishop and her husband invite Gibbs and the team for a special dinner.

Title: Cabin Fever
Synopsis: The NCIS team suspects Gibbs's arch-nemesis is behind an explosion at a summit for global terror event, but Gibbs elects to sit out the investigation in order to help a grief-stricken Fornell, whose life is on the verge of imploding following his wife's murder.

Title: Blast from the Past
Synopsis: A covert identity created for one of Gibbs' undercover cases from 20 years ago resurfaces when a murder victim is found living under the alias.

Title: The Artful Dodger
Synopsis: DiNozzo Senior comes to visit Tony as a surprise, but his knowledge and contacts within the black market art world will greatly help the team as they work to solve a murder involving a rare painting.

Title: Status Update
Synopsis: After the body of a thief is found in a Marine's house, NCIS discovers the calling card of a terror group Delilah and the Department of Defense have been tracking.

Title: Patience
Synopsis: The murder of a petty officer sparks a lead in a 40 year old airport bombing cold case that Gibbs and DiNozzo have been assigned to for the past two years while McGee is jealous that he was not previously briefed on the cold case.

Title: No Good Deed
Synopsis: DiNozzo is partnered with his girlfriend ATF Special Agent Zoé Keates after evidence reveals that the murder weapon in an NCIS case was originally purchased for the controversial ATF sting operation ‘Operation Fast and Furious.’ Also, Anthony DiNozzo Sr. returns to town for a special dinner to meet his son’s girlfriend.

Title: Lost in Translation
Synopsis: Gibbs and Bishop go to Afghanistan after the murder of a marine in Washington, D.C., is linked to a terror group that is holding another marine hostage overseas while DiNozzo gets upset when he learns that McGee is the new face of NCIS on recruitment brochures.

Title: Troll
Synopsis: Special Agent Ned Dorneget from NCIS cyber operations assists the team when a Navy ensign who worked in the Office of Naval Intelligence is murdered while the team discovers that Jake and Gibbs have become good friends.

Title: The Lost Boys
Synopsis: The NCIS cyber case turns into a united global effort after evidence confirms "The Calling", an international terrorist group that recruits children through the internet, has been purchasing S-bombs off the black market.

Title: Neverland
Synopsis: NCIS feverishly investigates a global terrorist group that is recruiting teens via the Internet, following a deadly bombing overseas that results in an emotional and surprising loss for the team.

Title: Stop the Bleeding
Synopsis: Two days after the events in the previous episode, Gibbs finds himself fighting for his life as he's treated on board the medical ward of the U.S.S. Daniel Webster while DiNozzo and CIA officer Joanna Teague who is also the mother of deceased NCIS Special Agent Ned Dorneget both travel to Shanghai, China to try and take down the Calling once and for all while everyone tries to come to terms with the fallout from Gibbs being shot.

Title: Personal Day
Synopsis: DEA agent Luis Mitchell is investigating a case that keeps going cold, prompting Gibbs to call on the NCIS team for help in solving the case once and for all. However, Tony soon discovers that there's more than Gibbs's personal connection and his desire to see Mitchell succeed while the team exchange gossip concerning Gibbs's new look after Gibbs trades his standard military haircut and polo shirt for a modern cut and tailored dress shirt.

Title: Incognito
Synopsis: A Marine calls Gibbs to discuss a possible case but the Marine is later found murdered in Quantico hours later, prompting the NCIS team to investigate and as this happens, McGee and Bishop must go undercover to run surveillance on a Marine Lieutenant and his wife.

Title: Double Trouble
Synopsis: When a murder case is revealed to be connected to a disgraced former NCIS Special Agent who was jailed for stealing, Vance returns to field duty and partners with Gibbs to solve the case once and for all.

Title: Lockdown
Synopsis: To help with a murder case, Abby visits a pharmaceutical lab but soon finds herself trapped and without any communications to the outside world after mysterious armed man take over the building and hold everyone hostage. Now, Abby must find a way to stop the bad guys before it's too late but all is not what it seems...

Title: Viral
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when the murder of a petty officer is revealed to match a M.O. that a local serial killer is using and it falls to the team to discover if this is the serial killer's latest victim or if it's a copycat killing while McGee and Delilah must learn to compromise before moving in together and potential tragedy lies in store for Bishop...

Title: 16 Years
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the murder of a Navy Lieutenant, they soon learn that Ducky is a member of a secret society dedicated to solving cold cases.

Title: Saviors
Synopsis: When insurgents in Sudan attack a group of volunteer doctors, DiNozzo and McGee travel to Sudan to investigate the crime scene and also tackle the joint murder and kidnapping case with DiNozzo reuniting with his ex-girlfriend, Jeanne Benoit as they attempt to rescue the missing doctors while attempting to get to the bottom of what happened.

Title: Day in Court
Synopsis: In order to clear his name, petty officer Kyle Friedgen volunteers to be court-martialed in order for NCIS to complete their own investigation after his murder case is dismissed due to a mishandled warrant while Bishop and Jake discuss their marital problems.

Title: Blood Brothers
Synopsis: When two Marines are killed in the line of duty, SECNAV Sarah Porter calls on the NCIS team to help a sailor battling leukemia locate a potential bone marrow transplant before it's too late while as Thanksgiving looms and in the aftermath of events in the previous episode, Bishop returns home to Oklahoma to spend the holidays with her family.

Title: Spinning Wheel
Synopsis: When Ducky is attacked by a man claiming to have information on Ducky's half-brother who died decades ago, the NCIS team jump into action as they seek to find the person responsible while Ducky remembers the final emotional days he had with his sibling and with the holidays fast approaching, Bishop and Jake reunite to discuss the future of their relationship.

Title: Sister City: Part 1
Synopsis: When the passengers and crew of a private plane are all fatally poisoned, the main NCIS team form a partnership with their counterparts in New Orleans to find Abby's brother and determine who, how and why the passengers were poisoned.

Title: Déjà Vu
Synopsis: When a Seaman who was set to testify before a grand jury is found dead at a rubbish dump, the NCIS team discover the resurgence of an international human-trafficking ring while McGee must spend the night at a colleague's home after a storm causes a massive power outage all through Washington D.C.
Written by: Matthew R. Jarrett & Scott J. Jarrett

Title: Decompressed
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a deep-sea diver and find them conducting an unorthodox investigation in which they examine the case on the outside while the remains and the victim's co-workers who are also suspects must stay in a high-tech decompression chamber for four days.

Title: React
Synopsis: When SECNAV Sarah Porter's teenage daughter is kidnapped, the NCIS team partner with the FBI, particularly FBI Agent Tobias Fornell in order to solve the case, determine a motive for the kidnapping and bring Porter's daughter home while McGee's childhood friend, NCIS Special Agent Valerie Page is in town to assist the team with advance tactics training.

Title: Loose Cannons
Synopsis: During an NCIS case, Dr. Cyril Taft finds himself experiencing the rush and thrills of being an assistant in the case after he's assigned surgical duty to a suspect that the team have in custody with Taft later discovering key evidence crucial to the case while DiNozzo pays his old girlfriend, Jeanne Benoit a visit as he chases a potential lead involving a group of doctors in Sudan.

Title: After Hours
Synopsis: The NCIS team find their plans being interrupted when they discover errors in a seemingly cut and dried case that has apparently been closed. As the team work to find out what's gone wrong in the case, McGee and Delilah argue over the importance of not discussing work during dinner while DiNozzo bores his date with shop talk.

Title: Scope
Synopsis: When an American couple are attacked in an area in Iraq, the NCIS team re-examine an ambush on a group of Special Ops that occurred in the same area six months prior to the attack. During the main investigation, Gibbs discovers that he needs the account of the solo survivor of the attack who is being treated for PTSD at the Walter Reed Memorial Center with Gibbs attempting to connect with the Marine.

Title: Reasonable Doubts
Synopsis: When a Navy Public Affairs officer is murdered, the NCIS must find out who is lying: the victim's wife or mistress after the two women accuse each other of other while Anthony DiNozzo Seniors returns to D.C. to help a homeless woman who believes he is her father.

Title: Charade
Synopsis: The NCIS team face a battle on their hands when DiNozzo's identity is stolen by multiple criminals who while posing as the fakes also begin blackmailing various Senators.

Title: Return to Sender
Synopsis: The NCIS team are reunited with FBI agent Tobias Fornell as they both investigate how two British prisoners, one of whom is a former spy both escaped after arriving in the United States via a shipping container while McGee goes apartment-hunting with DiNozzo and McGee is also determined to find out how DiNozzo purchased his own lavish place.

Title: Homefront
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a fourteen year old manages to foil a home invasion with Gibbs suspecting that the teenager is withholding something, possibly pertinent details while Director Vance and Senior FBI Agent Tobias Fornell travel to London as part of the ongoing escaped British spy case.

Title: Dead Letter
Synopsis: The NCIS team working alongside the FBI and MI6 redouble their efforts to find an escaped British spy with the manhunt spreading all over the world while one of their colleagues is left fighting for their life in ICU.

Title: Family First
Synopsis: NCIS, FBI and MI6 continue an international manhunt for an escaped British spy who is targeting current and former agents.

Title: Rogue
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigates a deadly car explosion in D.C. that is connected to NCIS Special Agent Nicholas Torres who disappeared six months ago while on a deep undercover assignment in Argentina. In the meantime, having rejected eight agents, Gibbs asks NCIS Special Agent Alexandra Quinn who recommended the agents to Gibbs to shadow his team.

Title: Being Bad
Synopsis: While investigating a death that took place at a reunion at Quantico, the NCIS team uncover a bomb plot which soon leads them to a long-running theft ring while Torres and Quinn adjust to life as members of Gibbs's team which also includes new sitting arrangements.

Title: Privileged Information
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate a Marine Sergeant who fell from a building, Doctor Grace Confalone confides in Gibbs that he should treat it as a murder investigation while Torres searches for a place to live.

Title: Love Boat
Synopsis: When the body of a Navy Lieutenant is discovered on board a destroyer during a tiger cruise where civilians guests are given the option of spending the night on the ship, Gibbs, Quinn and Palmer head to sea to investigate the circumstances behind the death while McGee thinks about the perfect proposal for Delilah.

Title: Philly
Synopsis: When a missing MI6 Officer is linked to a murdered petty officer, Gibbs sends Quinn and Bishop to Philadelphia to work with MI6 Officer Clayton Reeves with the case prompting Quinn to recall an NCIS case that made her leave field work and become an instructor at FLETC.

Title: Shell Game
Synopsis: After a Petty Officer escapes captivity, the NCIS team investigate and discover a connection her missing husband while Abby knits the NCIS newbies personalized gifts.

Title: Home of the Brave
Synopsis: Torres boldly breaks NCIS protocol when he discovers that a witness in a case that the NCIS team are investigating is wanted by I.C.E.- U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement while Abby, Bishop and McGee all attempt to woo landlord Tony DiNozzo Sr. in the hope of subletting Tony’s apartment,

Title: Enemy Combatant
Synopsis: After NCIS Agent Bishop is sent to Gitmo to gather evidence for a Navy chaplain murder case, she questions her previous work at the NSA. Also, Bishop's brothers, John and Robert visit for the Thanksgiving holiday and pester her co-workers to find out who she is dating. This episode was presented out of sequence. Originally this episode was intended to be presented after Pay to Play (episode). However for reasons that are unclear CBS decided to alter the schedule so that Enemy Combatant (episode) was shown before Pay to Play (episode).

Title: Pay to Play
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigates a series of escalating threats against congresswoman Jenna Fleming, while Director Vance oversees temporary protection detail. This episode was presented out of sequence. Originally this episode was intended to precede Enemy Combatant (episode). However for reasons that are unclear CBS decided to reverse the presentation schedule and show Enemy Combatant (episode) first.

Title: The Tie That Binds
Synopsis: After the NCIS team discover evidence from the murder of a Navy Captain is connected to Ducky's dead mother, Ducky finds himself questioning a pivotal life choice he made 37 years ago while the team exchanges holiday gifts, and Gibbs spends Christmas dinner with Fornell.

Title: Willoughby
Synopsis: NCIS searches for new leads after an undercover operation to apprehend a businessman who uses acts of terror to manipulate the stock market is compromised with Bishop and Qasim both later finding a break in the case.

Title: Off the Grid
Synopsis: After spotting the brother of an NCIS Most Wanted suspect, Gibbs immediately assumes a former alias and goes undercover with their infamous anti-government militia group while Bishop and Reeves work together on an off-the-books investigation.

Title: Keep Going
