Synopsis: Keep Going (episode) followed Enemy Combatant (episode) but presentation of the episode was rescheduled so that episode aired after Off the Grid (episode).
Written by: Scott Williams & Matthew R. Jarrett & Scott J. Jarrett

Title: Nonstop
Synopsis: The murder of a Petty Officer in a small town outside D.C. prompts NCIS to once again work with "The Sherlocks," a privately funded investigative team that includes their newest member, Anthony DiNozzo, Sr.

Title: Pandora's Box
Synopsis: After Abby’s homeland security think-tank is compromised and she is later found in be possession of a real bomb while participating in an undercover operation for Homeland Security at a rock concert, the NCIS team investigate and subsequently discover that the leader of the group has been murdered and a theoretical terror playbook has been stolen. This episode was the first part of the two part crossover between NCIS and NCIS: New Orleans.

Title: A Many Splendored Thing
Synopsis: Bishop is more determined than ever to seek revenge for the murder of her late boyfriend, Qasim Naasir after the NCIS team uncover a new lead in the Chen case while Torres teaches the agents the art of pickpocketing.
Written by: David J. North & Steven D. Binder

Title: What Lies Above
Synopsis: McGee discovers his apartment has been torn apart by a robber trying to locate an item of great value hidden somewhere by the convicted criminal who previously owned the unit while Congresswoman Flemming tries to persuade Director Vance to pursue a career in politics.

Title: M.I.A.
Synopsis: To carry out a sailor's dying wish, Gibbs and the NCIS team re-investigate a murder case that was originally ruled an accidental death with the case reminding Torres of a tragic time from his past.

Title: The Wall
Synopsis: When a Marine is murdered at an event for the Honor Flight Network, a non-profit that arranges for veterans to visit the World War II, Korea and Vietnam War Memorials for free, the NCIS team must rely on an irritable Vietnam War veteran, Henry Rogers, to provide details on the victim's whereabouts throughout the day while McGee and Bishop investigate a juicy rumor about Quinn and Torres.

Title: A Bowl of Cherries
Synopsis: After a vice admiral's laptop is infected with ransomware, he enlists McGee and the NCIS team to track down the hacker before the computer virus eliminates his personal and professional files while Alex takes time off to assist her mother, Marie Quinn, after she receives a "911" text.

Title: One Book, Two Covers
Synopsis: Torres must rely on old case notes and contacts after a Marine’s murder is linked to a former dirt bike gang he joined for a year-long undercover operation.

Title: Beastmaster
Synopsis: When a Marine Sergeant is found murdered in a National Park, the NCIS team partner with Mounted Police Sergeant May Dawson to solve a string of related crimes in the park.

Title: Something Blue
Synopsis: The stress of McGee and Delilah's imminent wedding takes its toll as Delilah is rushed to the hospital while the NCIS team travels out to sea after a young and healthy Petty Officer aboard a Navy destroyer dies in his sleep.

Title: Rendezvous
Synopsis: Gibbs, McGee and Torres travel to a remote area in Paraguay which is controlled by a group of violent rebels in an attempt to locate a missing Navy SEAL who disappeared during an unsanctioned trip.
Written by: George Schenck & Frank Cardea & Steven D. Binder

Title: House Divided
Synopsis: Two months after Gibbs and McGee were last seen fighting an elusive group of rebels in a Paraguay jungle, the NCIS team in D.C. tirelessly searches for their missing colleagues while Vance and Torres are summoned to a congressional hearing regarding the fallout from the Paraguay mission.

Title: Twofer
Synopsis: NCIS is called in to investigate when the body of a missing Navy Lieutenant who disappeared a year and a half ago is located by a cemetery grounds crew while they are relocating caskets on the property. As the team attempt to solve their latest case, Gibbs and McGee must pass a psych evaluation with Doctor Grace Confalone before officially resuming all work responsibilities

Title: Exit Strategy
Synopsis: While on a stakeout with Metro P.D., Torres's partner mysteriously vanishes with the subsequent investigation leading NCIS to uncover new evidence from a decade-old murder while Ducky's friend, Cadence Darwin presents him with a new opportunity during his guest lecture series.

Title: Skeleton Crew
Synopsis: Director Vance welcomes NCIS Special Agent Jacqueline "Jack" Sloane, a forensic psychologist he lobbied to transfer from California, to headquarters. Also, in the midst of a storm that has shut down Washington, D.C. and knocked out power, the NCIS team investigates the kidnapping of a sailor, which sends Torres and Bishop out to sea to track evidence.

Title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
Synopsis: After Reeves sees his friend get kidnapped, the NCIS team discovers the primary suspect disappeared two days ago with confidential military information while an embarrassing photo from McGee’s teenage years becomes a popular meme. This episode was presented out of sequence. Originally this episode was intended to be presented after Trapped. However for reasons that are unclear CBS decided to alter the schedule so that Fake it 'til You Make it will be shown before Trapped.

Title: Trapped
Synopsis: After a petty officer is found murdered on a golf course, McGee spends hours on the victim’s ham radio trying to locate a key witness while Palmer asks his co-workers to donate to a charity that builds playgrounds for kids of all abilities, and Torres surprises them with his generosity. This episode was presented out of sequence. Originally this episode was intended to be presented after Skeleton Crew. However for reasons that are unclear CBS decided to alter the schedule so that "Fake it 'til You Make" it will be shown before Trapped.

Title: Burden of Proof
Synopsis: After a convicted felon swears the NCIS agency framed him for murder a decade ago, Gibbs begins his own investigation, starting with a new autopsy by Ducky while Fornell joins the team since he was the lead investigator in the original joint FBI and NCIS case.

Title: Voices
Synopsis: An NCIS person of interest in a bribery and fraud case is found murdered after a runner is led to his body by a strange voice while McGee and Delilah disagree on whether to find out the baby's sex or keep it a surprise.

Title: Ready or Not
Synopsis: The team's Thanksgiving plans are put on hold while they track an elusive international arms dealer in D.C. who recently murdered an MI5 officer who was Sloane's close friend while Abby races Delilah to the hospital when her labor starts three weeks early.

Title: Double Down
Synopsis: As Torres and Sloane run protection detail for U.S. Senator John Phillips in Afghanistan for the holidays, they must urgently return to the States after hearing the senator’s son is in the ICU. As that happens, Gibbs and the rest of the team investigate the altercation that caused the life threatening injuries to the senator's son.

Title: High Tide
Synopsis: Torres and Bishop go undercover as a criminal couple available for hire, during an NCIS sting operation tracking illegal drug-running out of the Norfolk civilian marina.
Written by: David J. North & Steven D. Binder

Title: Dark Secrets
Synopsis: After a seemingly happy and successful Navy Lieutenant appears to have taken her own life, Gibbs and the team conduct a thorough investigation, interviewing family and friends from her past and present.

Title: Family Ties
Synopsis: After McGee and Torres visit the home of a high schooler who witnessed a hit and run, her parents, Christopher and Julie Bell, flee with their daughter, leaving NCIS in the lurch while Vance's daughter is arrested for shoplifting.

Title: Keep Your Friends Close
Synopsis: After the body of a missing Navy commander is found, Vance orders Gibbs and the team to work with former FBI Agent Tobias "T.C." Fornell, the private investigator who was hired to locate him while Bishop and Torres interview convicted investment advisor Albert Hathaway when the victim is linked to his highly publicized trial.

Title: Keep Your Enemies Closer
Synopsis: NCIS strikes a deal with convicted murderer Paul Triff, giving him a 48-hour furlough at his former residence, now McGee's home, in exchange for information that can convict his former cellmate, Gabriel Hicks, the murderer who deceived Gibbs and Fornell.

Title: Handle With Care
Synopsis: Gibbs and the team work to clear the name of retired Marine Sergeant John Ross when cyanide is found in one of the hundreds of care packages he sends to active-duty Marines.
Written by: Scott J. Jarrett & Matthew R. Jarrett

Title: One Man's Trash
Synopsis: Gibbs and Ducky see an antique war stick on television that the two soon realize could be the missing murder weapon to a 16-year-old cold case.

Title: Death From Above
Synopsis: The NCIS headquarters are evacuated after the team discovers a body as well as bomb materials on the roof of the squad room. Also, the team reads the first draft of Ducky's book.

Title: The Numerical Limit
Synopsis: Gibbs is granted protective custody of a 10-year-old orphaned refugee, Elena, when an NCIS case reveals she is the target of a violent gang.
Written by: David J. North & Steven D. Binder

Title: Sight Unseen
Synopsis: NCIS searches for a Petty Officer suspected of assault who escapes when the sheriff transporting him crashes into a lake while Torres works closely with Annie Barth, a key blind witness who heard vital evidence needed to solve the case.

Title: One Step Forward
Synopsis: Sara Carter begs Gibbs to investigate her mother's murder as she believes the local authorities convicted the wrong man while Abby is awarded a dinner reservation for two to a brand-new five-star restaurant in an igloo and has to decide which coworker deserves to go with her.

Title: Two Steps Back
Synopsis: When evidence reveals an NCIS team member is a hitman's latest target, the team must search through old case files to determine who is seeking vengeance.

Title: Fallout
Synopsis: While Gibbs attends the memorial service for a friend who was lost at sea, he discovers that the deceased, Navy Captain Phillip Brooks, has been hiding in a fallout shelter after his boat was attacked and he swam to shore.
Written by: David J. North & Christopher J. Waild

Title: Date With Destiny
Synopsis: Sloane is adamant that a man who held her hostage and tortured her years ago in Afghanistan, and was believed to have been killed following her rescue, is alive and in D.C., leading Vance and Gibbs to fear she is willing to risk everything to destroy this man.
Written by: Scott Williams & George Schenck & Frank Cardea

Title: Destiny's Child
Synopsis: Gibbs is assigned the role of acting director while the team continues their worldwide search for Director Vance.

Title: Love Thy Neighbor
Synopsis: After a Navy lieutenant is found murdered in his hot tub, the team interviews several families in the victim's peculiar neighborhood while Torres must face the consequences after a volatile night out with Palmer.

Title: Boom
Synopsis: One of the NCIS agents is starstruck after the team investigates an explosion outside the home of Navy Petty Officer First Class Todd Nicholas and his wife, popular reality TV star Sheba Nicholas. Also, Vance continues physical therapy for the injuries sustained when he was held hostage.

Title: Third Wheel
Synopsis: Gibbs’ quiet vacation at his remote cabin is interrupted by a surprise visit from Tobias Fornell and Navy Captain Phillip Brooks, as well as a call from NCIS asking for his help locating a robber hiding in the woods near him.

Title: Fragments
Synopsis: After a 50-year-old tape recording left by a murder victim is found, the NCIS team tries to exonerate Ray Jennings, the Marine serving a life sentence for the crime.

Title: Beneath The Surface
Synopsis: After NCIS arrives at a Halloween crime scene, Torres recognizes the victim as a friend from federal law enforcement training while Jimmy thinks his lab is haunted by ghosts after objects keep mysteriously moving.
Written by: Scott J. Jarrett & Matthew R. Jarrett

Title: A Thousand Words
Synopsis: After a mural by a street artist and activist is stolen, the NCIS investigation leads to a conspiracy regarding a Navy contractor and the safety of ocean mammals. Also, Bishop shares a special connection with the street artist.

Title: Friendly Fire
Synopsis: McGee and Bishop travel to Afghanistan after a murder case in the states is linked to a string of soldiers killed by friendly fire overseas while Kasie leaves the lab and accompanies Torres into the field to process additional forensic evidence.

Title: Tailing Angie
Synopsis: When the lead suspect of an unsolved and high-profile robbery case is released from prison, the NCIS team resumes their investigation with an undercover stakeout.

Title: What Child is This?
Synopsis: The team's holiday plans are put on hold when the murder investigation of a Navy veteran includes the discovery of a newborn baby who has no identification and no apparent ties to a family.

Title: Toil and Trouble
Synopsis: United States Secretary of Defense Wynn Crawford shuts down Gibbs's murder investigation and demands that Special Agents McGee and Torres be arrested for their actions in the case.

Title: The Last Link
Synopsis: An old family friend, Army Corporal John Sydney, beseeches Gibbs to join him on a road trip to search for a missing military I.D. bracelet while the rest of the team investigate when a Navy Lieutenant in NCIS protective custody is fatally poisoned by an infamous drug dealer.

Title: She
Synopsis: After a malnourished and confused nine year old girl is found hiding in a storage unit, NCIS reopens an old missing persons case when the girl is believed to be the daughter of a Navy recruit who disappeared 10 years ago while Bishop soon discovers notes that former NCIS Special Agent Ziva David kept on the case long after the team officially stopped investigating.

Title: Once Upon a Tim
Synopsis: McGee reluctantly visits his high school after the unique computer password he used as a teenager is linked to the murder of a department of defense contractor. The case escalates when an intruder breaks into McGee's home in an attempt to steal his archaic high school computer.
Written by: David J. North & Steven D. Binder

Title: Crossing The Line
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigates a man overboard fatality from a Navy destroyer at sea while Torres is frustrated when Vance assigns him to mentor three high school students.

Title: Bears and Cubs
Synopsis: Jimmy is torn between family and work after his father-in-law, Ed, asks him to tamper with evidence from NCIS's current murder investigation while Ed's poker buddy, Anthony DiNozzo, Sr., offers to help with the case.

Title: Silent Service
Synopsis: Director Vance is notified by the Pentagon that the nuclear submarine Gibbs and Bishop are aboard to conduct a murder investigation has gone radio silent.
Written by: Scott J. Jarrett & Matthew R. Jarrett

Title: Mona Lisa
Synopsis: Torres relies on his team's investigative skills after he wakes up on a dilapidated fishing boat, covered in blood and unable to remember the last 12 hours.

Title: Perennial
Synopsis: Following an active shooter lockdown at a naval hospital, the NCIS team searches for a suspect who fled the scene with Sloane also personally investigating after she discovers that someone from her past was inside the hospital and as such, is a key witness in the case.

Title: Hail & Farewell
Synopsis: NCIS investigates the murder of a Marine Major believed to have been killed in the 9/11 attack on the Pentagon after human remains are discovered at a construction site. A personal history with the victim drives Gibbs to solve her crime.

Title: Judge, Jury...
Synopsis: After entering cold case DNA into the system, Kasie solves a 30-year-old murder case, but a loophole in the legal system may set the suspect free. Also, McGee visits an elite technology company in Silicon Valley that is offering him a highly paid position.

Title: ...and Executioner
Synopsis: After NCIS finds a secret government bank account that’s funding a nationwide network of vigilante justice, the team must determine who is acting as judge and jury.
Written by: Christopher J. Waild & David J. North

Title: Lost Time
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigates the murder of a Marine Sergeant in the States who was hailed as a war hero for his efforts overseas. Also, Gibbs turns to Doctor Grace Confalone for advice after he uncharacteristically unravels and abandons his team at a crime scene investigation.

Title: Daughters
Synopsis: Former FBI Agent Tobias Fornell pleads with Gibbs to do whatever is necessary to take down drug dealers and suppliers in the area after his daughter, Emily Fornell, is hospitalized from an opiate overdose. Gibbs is haunted by the personal aspects of the case and his history with vigilante justice.

Title: Out of the Darkness
Synopsis: Ziva surprises Gibbs with a cryptic warning, prompting him to question why she remained underground for years while being presumed dead by her family and her former NCIS colleagues.

Title: Into the Light
Synopsis: With their lives in danger, Gibbs and Ziva's rogue investigation takes an unexpected turn when a possible terrorist plot is revealed.

Title: Going Mobile
Synopsis: After the body of a Marine Lieutenant is found hidden under an 18-wheeler, the NCIS team tracks the vehicle’s previous locations to pinpoint the crime scene and suspect. Also, Sloane encourages the team to sit down and talk about Ziva’s recent reappearance.

Title: Someone Else's Shoes
Synopsis: The NCIS team links a bizarre crime scene at Arlington National Cemetery to a string of attacks on homeless veterans. Also, Vance orders McGee, Bishop and Torres to complete hours of evidence garage cleanup duty for withholding information.

Title: Wide Awake
Synopsis: NCIS investigates Marine Corporal Laney Alimonte after evidence suggests she murdered her neighbor while being treated for insomnia by a hypnotherapist. Also, Gibbs befriends his new neighbors after the 9-year-old’s baseball crashes through his window.

Title: Institutionalized
Synopsis: When a petty officer’s son is found murdered at his “welcome home from prison” party, the evidence suggests Kasie’s lifelong best friend, Dante Brown, is the suspect.

Title: No Vacancy
Synopsis: While investigating a Marine’s murder, the NCIS team uncovers a labyrinth of live-streaming spy cameras hidden in the rooms of a Virginia motel.

Title: Musical Chairs
Synopsis: The team investigates the murder of a musician in the Navy's most elite band that performs at diplomatic events around the world.

Title: IRL
Synopsis: The team investigates a petty officer's murder that was live-streamed on a popular gaming app. Also, Gibbs watches his 11-year-old neighbor, Phineas, when his mom must leave on a last-minute trip.

Title: The North Pole
Synopsis: Gibbs and the team assist Ziva with "the one thing" she said she would need to take care of before returning to her family.

Title: In The Wind
Synopsis: Gibbs must face the reality of his actions after he assists Ziva with “the one thing” she said she would need to take care of before returning to her family.

Title: Flight Plan
Synopsis: The team investigates an F-18 crash and the subsequent disappearance of the pilot who operated the aircraft. Also, McGee reluctantly discusses a very personal decision with his teammates.

Title: Sound Off
Synopsis: After a body is found at an unmanned aerial vehicle testing site, the team must determine if the death was murder or an accident. Also, Palmer carefully interviews medical examiner assistant candidates.

Title: On Fire
Synopsis: After Torres and Bishop are victims of a hit-and-run, Torres fights for his life in the ICU.
Written by: David J. North & Steven D. Binder

Title: Lonely Hearts
Synopsis: The lead suspect in a murder investigation is a woman Gibbs' friend, Phil Brooks, met on a dating site. Also, Sloane has a secret admirer on Valentine's Day.

Title: Ephemera
Synopsis: While investigating the suicide of a retired Navy officer who left a rare, valuable - and possibly stolen - coin to the National Museum of the Navy, the team imagines themselves in his life story in order to piece together how the coin ended up in his possession.

Title: In a Nutshell
Synopsis: As the team investigates the death of a Navy officer murdered the same way as his parents a decade ago, they stumble across a storage container filled with dollhouses that display recreations of murder scenes. Also, the team agrees to clean out their living spaces, but some have a harder time saying goodbye to their possessions than others.

Title: Schooled
Synopsis: The team searches for answers when the body of a well-regarded Navy technician in the Reserves is found floating in a lake where a popular community event is being held. Also, Sloane is caught off-guard when her daughter, Faith, makes an unexpected request.
Written by: Kate Torgovnick May & Steven D. Binder

Title: Blarney
Synopsis: When Kasie and Jimmy are held hostage in a diner after a jewellery store robbery goes awry, they attempt to keep the other customers safe from the thieves.

Title: The Arizona
Synopsis: The team tries to verify the identity of Joe Smith, who claims he served on the USS Arizona during the attack on Pearl Harbor, and wants to be buried there upon his death.

Title: Sturgeon Season
Synopsis: Gibbs and Fornell attempt to track down the leader of a drug ring who supplied drugs to Fornell's daughter. Also, the team deals with the case of a missing cadaver from the NCIS autopsy room.

Title: Everything Starts Somewhere
Synopsis: Flashbacks reveal the murder case that first introduced young Gibbs to NCIS and his introduction to young, new-to-America Ducky.

Title: Blood and Treasure
Synopsis: The discovery of two dead bodies in a forest leads the team into the wild world of modern-day treasure hunting, and Gibbs and Fornell get deeper into their search for the opioid kingpin.

Title: Sunburn
Synopsis: McGee and Delilah's Bahamian vacation turns into a high-stakes mission when a case NCIS is tracking of a dead escape room manager has ties to the island. Also, Gibbs fears the worst when his search for Fornell leads to blood.

Title: Head of the Snake
Synopsis: Gibbs and Fornell's crusade to find the head of the drug ring responsible for Emily's overdose comes to a climax. Also, Gibbs and Vance finally let the team in on a case that has dangerous implications.

Title: 1mm
Synopsis: Following a tip about smuggled weapons, Bishop and Torres engage in a shootout in a former sheriff's residence that's now a historical site, only to find themselves locked in abandoned jail cells there.

Title: The First Day
Synopsis: The team investigates the murder of a Navy officer who was killed while driving home a recently released inmate. Also, Gibbs helps Palmer deal with a personal trauma.

Title: True Believer
Synopsis: When Sloane's name is discovered in Afghanistan at the site of an abandoned bus with a dead driver, Gibbs accompanies her on a trip to find a group of girls who were kidnapped from the bus. Also, McGee, Bishop and Torres track down a hacker who emailed compromising information to the Taliban.

Title: Winter Chill
Synopsis: The team dives into the competitive world of food trucks after finding a man frozen to death in the back of one.

Title: Watchdog
Synopsis: The team uncovers a secret dogfighting ring, which leads to an unexpected move by one of the team members.

Title: Gut Punch
Synopsis: Vance assigns McGee, Torres and Bishop to COVID compliance duty at a foreign affairs summit, where they discover a link to another NCIS team's murder case.

Title: Sangre
Synopsis: Evidence from the stabbing of a Marine Sergeant leads Torres to meet his father, who left when he was a child.

Title: Misconduct
Synopsis: While the team investigates a biker killed in a hit and run, Gibbs prepares to testify against a financial advisor who stole millions from his Navy clients.
Written by: Brendan Fehily & Margaret Rose Lester & David J. North

Title: Unseen Improvements
Synopsis: The team tracks a stolen laptop to the uncle of a young boy who is Gibbs' former neighbor.

Title: Blown Away
Synopsis: When members of an NCIS Regional Enforcement Action Capabilities Training Team (REACT) are killed during an explosion, Special Agent Jessica McKnight, the lone surviving member, helps crack the case using high tech body armor.

Title: Rule 91
Synopsis: While pursuing a dangerous arms dealer, the team is shocked when Bishop is implicated in an old NSA leak. Also, Gibbs and Marcie realize the killer they've been tracking may be onto them.

Title: Blood in the Water
Synopsis: As the team searches for Gibbs after wreckage from his boat is discovered, they find out he was tracking a serial killer with journalist Marcie Warren, who wrote an exposé on him.

Title: Nearly Departed
Synopsis: While trying to find the serial killer Gibbs was after, the team discovers another person has been tracking the case as well.

Title: Road to Nowhere
Synopsis: Gibbs and Parker go on a road trip to find one of the serial killer's victims. Also Knight goes undercover at a large manufacturing company with ties to the murders.

Title: Great Wide Open
Synopsis: Gibbs and McGee head to Alaska while the team works at home to uncover the conspiracy behind the serial killer.

Title: Face the Strange
Synopsis: The team investigates the death of a Navy commander whose body suddenly explodes before Jimmy can examine it.

Title: False Start
Synopsis: The team investigates the death of a beloved Navy commander who trained some of the top athletes in the country.

Title: Docked
Synopsis: The team investigates the death of a man on a cruise ship whose body is discovered in the ship's sauna by none other than McGee's mother-in-law.

Title: Peacekeeper
Synopsis: The team investigates the case of a Navy reservist whose body is found in a beat-up car at the end of a gun range. Also, Kasie weighs the pros and cons of buying a gun.

Title: Collective Memory
Synopsis: When a hotshot financial advisor is found shot at a naval station, the team investigates the case of interviewing the victim's three-dimensional hologram of herself, which she created before her death.

Title: Pledge of Allegiance
Synopsis: The team is called in when a Navy chief warrant officer is suspected of trying to sell stolen classified Navy software used to pilot combat drones.

Title: All Hands
Synopsis: After a civilian research vessel in the North Atlantic picks up a small boat of wounded Navy officers, the team arrives on the ship and is forced to hide after discovering terrorists on board. Also, Knight takes a paper doll with her on the mission to capture photos for her niece's grade school class.

Title: Fight or Flight
Synopsis: When the body of a Navy lieutenant is discovered missing an eye, the team investigation leads to the world of cage fighting.

Title: The Helpers
Synopsis: While investigating the death of an intruder at Quantico, Jimmy and Kasie are exposed to a deadly biotoxin, and the team calls on Carol Wilson for help as they race to find the antidote. Also, Torres tries to distract Jimmy's daughter who came to the office to spend the day with her dad.

Title: First Steps
Synopsis: As the team investigates the cause of death of a reservist Navy Seal surgeon, they're forced to bring Vance's daughter, who recently trained with NCIS, to help with a highly dangerous mission.

Title: Thick As Thieves
Synopsis: Parker's delinquent past resurfaces when the team is called to Philadelphia to investigate the death of a Navy petty officer.

Title: The Wake
Synopsis: A gruesome mishap at a Navy petty officer's gender-reveal party leads the team to the case of a missing teacher that was popularized on a true crime podcast.

Title: Starting Over
Synopsis: The team investigates the apparent suicide of a retired Navy officer who was in Palmer and Knight's grief group. Also, Torres gets a call from Jane Tennant to come to Hawai'i when she gets a lead on a witness from a case they worked on together.

Title: Last Dance
Synopsis: When an infamous arms dealer is released from prison and bodies start piling up, Torres is forced to face the repercussions of his actions during an undercover operation he worked on years ago.

Title: The Brat Pack
Synopsis: The team investigates a ring of clever teenage partygoers when a string of break-ins takes place at Marine Base Quantico. Whereas working the case, McGee forms a bond with one of the teens.

Title: All or Nothing
Synopsis: The team investigates the unexpected death of a Navy reservist who was an investigative journalist while Knight and Jimmy's budding romance is put on hold when a vital organ transfer goes fatally wrong.
Written by: & Marco Schnabel & Yasemin Yilmaz Yasemin Yilmaz

Title: Birds of a Feather
Synopsis: When Parker is framed for murder, the team puts their jobs and lives on the line in order to buy time and uncover the truth.

Title: A Family Matter
Synopsis: Parker is still on the run with his ex-wife, so the team investigates who from his past might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker's name. Enlisting the help of Special Agent Jane Tennant and Computer Specialist Ernie Malik, who are in town meeting with Vance in preparation for a global military exercise, the group tracks down their prime suspect, The Raven.

Title: Daddy Issues
Synopsis: McGee's personal and professional life intersect when a dad from his children's school is linked to a break-in at a government storage bunker.

Title: Unearth
Synopsis: When a dead body is found at an ancient burial site that is thought to be cursed, the team tries to determine the motive and the symbolism behind the crime. Also, as Torres continues therapy with Grace Confalone, he discovers that their lives are in danger.

Title: Leave No Trace
Synopsis: Knight's past resurfaces when her ex-boyfriend, a National Park Service agent, teams up with the team to investigate a campsite murder.

Title: Guardian
Synopsis: Parker steps up to protect Vance after a terrifying home invasion. Also, the team detects advancements in Jessica and Jimmy's blossoming romance.

Title: The Good Fighter
Synopsis: When an NCIS agent turns up dead and Kasie goes unaccounted for, the team must work quickly to find the killer.

Title: Love Lost
Synopsis: The team must investigate the Secretary of the Navy when her husband claims she tried to murder him.

Title: Turkey Trot
Synopsis: After an unknown shooter causes chaos at annual Thanksgiving 5K, time is of the essence for the team to find the culprit. Also, Kasie joins Knight for Thanksgiving lunch at Knight's sister's house.

Title: Higher Education
Synopsis: The team investigates the death of a college student who was killed while running across the street and had connections to Delilah.

Title: Too Many Cooks
Synopsis: Agents from Washington D.C., L.A. and Hawai'i, all in D.C. to attend the retirement party of a beloved Federal Law Enforcement Training Center (FLETC) professor, find themselves investigating his shocking suicide.

Title: Bridges
Synopsis: Parker discovers he's a victim of identity theft while investigating the unusual murder of a Navy ensign. Also, Knight and Jimmy face hurdles in their relationship as their connection heightens.

Title: Big Rig
Synopsis: When an old pal of Torres' comes to him - disheveled and bloodied - for guidance amidst an undercover FBI operation and then disappears, the team helps track him down. Also, McGee prepares to contestant on a popular game show.

Title: Evil Eye
Synopsis: In preparation for a role, a world-renowned actress shadows the team as they investigate a decapitation case.

Title: Old Wounds
Synopsis: Parker grapples with his emotions when a conman from his past turns up as a prime suspect in the murder of a Navy officer transporting millions of dollars' worth of opioids.

Title: Unusual Suspects
Synopsis: The team investigates the death of a ride-share driver who was found after a car accident. Also, Parker's father who is temporarily living with him, assists the team in their investigation.

Title: Butterfly Effect
Synopsis: The team jumps into motion to investigate who is responsible for a potential bio terror attack at a strip mall parking garage. Also, Knight's father deals with a health scare while in Japan.

Title: Stranger in a Strange Land
Synopsis: The team works to solve the murder of a Marine private who appears to have been killed for helping an Afghan refugee. Also, Jimmy navigates the pressure of parenting his teenage daughter, who is eager to go out on an unchaperoned group date.

Title: Head Games
Synopsis: The team digs deep to investigate a Navy lieutenant who's accused of trying to murder her husband but has no memory of the attack. Also, Kasie navigates a potential medical scare.

Title: In the Spotlight
Synopsis: Knight goes viral for saving a mother and child from a potentially fatal car accident.

Title: Second Opinion
Synopsis: The team works to solve the murder of a senator's daughter who has a rebellious reputation and large online following. Also, Jimmy gets competitive with an old college rival.

Title: Kompromat
Synopsis: When a suspicious murder occurs in the classified section of the National Archive, the team must investigate a string of Russian spy encounters that may be a linked to the crime. Also, Jimmy accidentally makes a confession that could change the course of his relationship with Knight.

Title: Black Sky
Synopsis: Torres finds himself in prison as the team tries to stop an impending terror attack on U.S. soil.

Title: Algún Día
Synopsis: The NCIS team must help Torres when he puts his future at stake by confronting the man who tormented his family when he was a child.

Title: The Stories We Leave Behind
Synopsis: As NCIS mourns the loss of Ducky, the agents find comfort in working on one of his unfinished cases involving a young woman whose father was dishonorably discharged from the Marines.

Title: Lifeline
Synopsis: When the NCIS team engages in Walk-a-Mile day to gain a new perspectives on different departments, things take a turn when Kasie receives a distress call from a mysterious man.

Title: Left Unsaid
Synopsis: When an officer goes missing during his wedding proposal, the NCIS team against time to find him before it's too late.

Title: The Plan
Synopsis: With the help of Knight's father, NCIS works to unravel the mystery of a recently used service weapon belonging to a missing agent while McGee is in a tailspin when DNA results reveal a close relative he was unaware of.

Title: Strange Invaders
Synopsis: After discovering a navy pilot's body riddled with unusual wounds, NCIS' investigation draws the team into the rabbit hole of UFO conspiracy theories.
Written by: Gina Gold & Aurorae Khoo & Steven D. Binder

Title: A Thousand Yards
Synopsis: NCIS comes under attack by a mysterious enemy from the past. Also, Vance tries to mend fences with his estranged son by explaining why, despite the ongoing dangers of his job, he still chooses to stay at NCIS.

Title: Heartless
Synopsis: The NCIS team looks for a motive behind the kidnapping and death of a famous heart surgeon.

Title: Prime Cut
Synopsis: After discovering the remains of a Marine captain, the NCIS team travels to Texas to interrogate the suspected killer.

Title: Reef Madness
Synopsis: Parker and Knight discover three bodies on an old Navy ship that’s about to be sunk and turned into an artificial reef, when they’re suddenly locked inside by a mysterious figure. Also, Vance offers Knight a unique opportunity
